DOC.brief_title: Study Oral AEE788 Adults With Advanced Cancer
DOC.criteria: Histologically confirm solid tumor Adequate hematologic , renal hepatic function Age ≥ 18 year Karnofsky performance status score ≥ 70 % Life expectancy ≥ 12 week Active brain metastasis Peripheral neuropathy > grade 2 Diarrhea > grade 1 Gastrointestinal ( GI ) dysfunction Compromised cardiac function Concurrent severe and/or uncontrolled medical condition
